class_notes: Permission Only - Program Approval to Take Courses Required.
course_description: Pre-Requisites: PRS 500D as prerequisite or special permission required to enroll. EH 500 is a survey course designed to introduce public health students to basic concepts of environmental sciences, to the methods used to study the interface of health and the environment, to the health impacts of various environmental processes and exposures, and to the public health approach to controlling or eliminating environmental health risks.
prerequisites:
Prereq. for AEPI Students: AEPI 530D, AEPI 534D, AEPI 536D, AEPI 538D, BIOS 516D, BIOS 517D, BIOS 518D, or by special permission to enroll.
Prereq. for PRS Students: PRS 505D, PRS 535D, PRS 542D, as prerequisites or by special permission to enroll.
